recipes.name: Fluffy Pancakes
recipes.instructions: In a bowl, mix 1 cup of flour, 1 tablespoon of sugar, and a pinch of salt. In another bowl, whisk 1 egg, 1 cup of milk, and 2 tablespoons of melted butter. Combine the wet and dry ingredients and mix until smooth. Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and grease lightly. Pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake. Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden. Serve warm.

recipes.name: Flour Tortilla Wraps
recipes.instructions: In a bowl, mix 2 cups of flour, a pinch of salt, 1 beaten egg, and 3/4 cup of milk. Knead into a smooth dough and let it rest for 20 minutes. Divide into small balls, roll out each ball into a thin circle, and cook on a hot skillet for 1-2 minutes on each side until lightly golden.

recipes.name: Cheesy Scrambled Eggs
recipes.instructions: Whisk 2 eggs with 2 tablespoons of milk, a pinch of salt, and a pinch of pepper. Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add the egg mixture and gently stir. When the eggs are almost set, add 1/4 cup of shredded cheese. Continue stirring until the cheese melts. Serve immediately.
